name: I Flew ANA's IMPRESSIVE 777 Premium Class! (Domestic)
description:
ANA, or All Nippon Airways, is the largest airline in Japan, and is generally seen as one of the best airlines in the world.

In addition to an extensive international network, they also connect many cities within Japan, and some of those routes are flown with dedicated widebody aircraft configured just for domestic flights.

Towards the end of our visit to Japan in May, we needed to get from Osaka to Tokyo, and chose ANA for that flight. It turned out to be one of the best domestic flights I've ever had!

-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-

FLIGHT INFORMATION
Airline: ANA - All Nippon Airways (ANA/NH)
Aircraft: Boeing 777-200ER (B772)
Flight Number: NH024
Seat: 4A (Premium Class)
Livery: Standard
Engines: 2x Pratt & Whitney PW4090
Registration: JA715A
Route: Osaka-Itami (ITM) - Tokyo-Haneda (HND)
Callsign: ALL NIPPON 024 heavy
Runway used: 32L (ITM) - 22 (HND)
Date filmed: May 2023
